t: r/malefashionadvice on Reddit: Target is dropping Mossimo and Merona
s: July 6, 2017 - I love their Mossimo stuff too. ... I don't really think this switch was really necessary. Target already had some great, timeless staples like Merona OCBD's and such at an affordable price. Hopefully the new brands aren't ridiculously overpriced "designer" brands of fast fashion like H&M.

t: Two Beloved Target Fashion Brands Are Going Bye Bye & Here's Why
s: July 6, 2017 - It's legit like a New Year's resolution at Target RN — "Out with the old, in with the new." Upon announcing that it will introduce a dozen exclusive new brands over the next two years, with four of those arriving this fall, Target is phasing out two core fashion brands — Mossimo and Merona.
